meanings.definition: A person who laughs loudly or uncontrollably.
meanings.sent1: The lollers at the comedy show couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends had a lollers among them who always made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent3: The lollers in the movie theater made the film even funnier with their contagious laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her infectious laughter filled the room, earning her the title of the lollers of the group.
meanings.sent5: The lollers' joyful laughter echoed through the park, spreading happiness to all around.

meanings.sent1: She lollers whenever she watches funny videos online.
meanings.sent2: The children lollers at the silly clown's antics during the birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jokes always make the audience lollers with delight.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected twist in the movie made everyone in the theater lollers with surprise.
meanings.sent5: His hilarious dance moves never fail to make everyone lollers at the family gatherings.

meanings.definition: An expression of amusement or laughter.
meanings.sent1: His text message was full of lollers, showing how much he enjoyed the joke.
meanings.sent2: The internet is filled with memes that evoke lollers from people worldwide.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character's silly antics always bring lollers from the audience.
meanings.sent4: The stand-up comedian's jokes were met with lollers from the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The sound of lollers filled the room, creating a cheerful atmosphere.
